divs: sighting detailsok, i went to a map and looked up the road numbers and stuff to the previous entry. my dad was on la 473 driving from hornbeck to la 191, he was going to turn right at the intersection of 473 and 191, this would take him up to the road that would cross from louisiana to texas. i looked it up on google earth and from where he left the roadway when he saw the bright lights to the point that he ended up was 8 1\2 miles to the south. i now can remember my dad saying that all he saw was lights, no sounds. after he got the car back on the road he did not look back because he at first thought it was a bunch of boys in big 4x4 trucks and he was alone, he had no way to protect himself. he just wanted to get away before some trouble started. he did not think much of it until he realized that he was not on la 473 anymore. he was 8 1\2 miles away on another road ( la 191 ) at the toledo bend dam. that is when it hit him, something about those lights. that is when he went back to see his tire tracks and hope to solve the puzzle that he quickly found himself in. he told me that he could see the black tire marks on the road as he turned hard to the left and he saw the tire marks in the dirt and the tire marks just stopped in the ditch. no tire marks coming back to the highway. he told me that he thought that his car was picked up and placed on hwy 191, he said that it sounds - out of this world - but that is what happened. he wispered to me, i think it was a ufo. my dad was a baptist preacher and he did not make things up. i do believe him but we don't know how to explain what happened.
Summary: 8 to 10 bright lights just above the road
